meanings.definition: The beliefs, practices, or way of life of a hermit.
meanings.sent2: People are curious about the hermitisms of those who live in seclusion.
meanings.sent3: The hermitisms of living alone can be quite peaceful.
meanings.sent4: In a world of noise, hermitisms stand out like a beacon of quiet.
meanings.sent5: The hermitisms of simplicity and detachment are admirable qualities.

meanings.definition: The state of being a hermit.
meanings.sent1: His hermitisms were evident in his preference for isolation.
meanings.sent2: The hermitisms of the old man were respected by the villagers.
meanings.sent3: Despite his hermitisms, he was always willing to help others in need.
meanings.sent4: The hermitisms of seclusion shielded him from the chaos of the world.
meanings.sent5: The hermitisms of solitude brought him a sense of peace and contentment.

meanings.definition: The qualities or characteristics of a hermit.
meanings.sent1: The hermitisms of simplicity and humility were admired by all.
meanings.sent2: His hermitisms included a deep connection to nature.
meanings.sent3: The hermitisms of silence and contemplation defined his lifestyle.
meanings.sent4: Her hermitisms of independence and self-reliance were inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The hermitisms of solitude and reflection shaped his worldview.
